creator: Fun Blocks Studio
descriptionHtml:
Control where fruit to fall on, merge two same fruits into a bigger one until into a big watermelon - this is how you get started with this addictive merging game.

Think strategically, make the most of the space, and beat the score you've made to obtain a higher record.

Combining a puzzle merging game with a classic fruit matching game, Fruit Merge Mania is a relaxing and addictive new free game that is going to be a hit in 2021. If you’re looking for a way to relax your brain or to kill time, don’t miss it out.

How to Play?
Simply tap on your screen to control where you want the fruit to fall.
When two same fruits touch, they will be merged into a bigger one until a super big watermelon appears.
Slightly tilt your phone to make the fruit roll and merge. Do not tilt too much especially when fruits almost reach the check line. Otherwise, the game is over.
Increase your score with skills and concentration. Challenge yourself and see how many big watermelons you can merge into! Invite friends to play, enjoy merging together!

Features of Fruit Merge Mania:
- Simple to play but with extreme fun;
- Comfortable and lovely interface;
- Multiple fruit styles to explore and experience;
- No internet connection required. Enjoy merging anywhere at any time;
- No time limit, best casual game to kill your free time;
- Free to play & no ads;
- Suitable for all ages;
- Train your brain to be smarter;
- Optimized for mobile. The best merging experience ever.

Control, blast and merge more big watermelons! Download it now and start merging and having fun!
descriptionShort: Merge fruits into a watermelon. Simple fruit merging game for 2021. Try it now!
